Applicant applied for a self-permit and will act as his/her own general contractor with full responsibility for code compliance, for hiring and employing individuals and subcontractors, and with ultimate responsibility for his/her own work and for the work of others. Acting as his/her general contractor, applicant may forfeit certain protections which might be available to him/her through the State of Tennessee general contractor�s licensing process. Applicant, as a self-build permit holder, is further responsible for requesting all required inspections and completing all authorized work in compliance with applicable adopted codes.
